package.name: miniroscpp
package.description:
miniroscpp contains C++ code for doing things that are not necessarily ROS related, but are useful for multiple packages. This includes things like the MINIROS_DEPRECATED and MINIROS_FORCE_INLINE macros, as well as code for getting backtraces.
All references to boost were replaced by standard libraries.
package.author: John Faust
Dmitry Kargin
